headline: 5 Must-Read Analyst Questions From ADP’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: Automatic Data Processing’s Q3 results were met with a negative market reaction despite revenue and non-GAAP profit slightly exceeding Wall Street expectations. Management pointed to growth in new business bookings—particularly in small business retirement and insurance services—and noted an uptick in HR Outsourcing and enterprise product Lyric HCM. CEO Maria Black acknowledged, however, that client hiring remained subdued, with Employer Services pays per control rounding down to 0%, reflecting
